TriggerGroup.name: status
TriggerGroup.script: -- Triggers for capturing & updating data related to PC status such as health, location, and spell affects

TriggerGroup.name: Affect Tracking
TriggerGroup.script: -- Keep track of spell effects through 'up' and 'down' messages

Trigger.name: Spell Nullified
Trigger.script: if session == 2 or session == 3 then send( "gt My magic doesn't seem very useful against this enemy." ) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your spell fails to penetrate his defenses.$

TriggerGroup.name: Prompt Filter
TriggerGroup.script: -- Use a snippet of our prompt to enable the more complex pattern

Trigger.name: Group Status
Trigger.script:
local hpc, maxHP = matches[2], matches[3] local mnc, mnm = matches[4], matches[5] local mvc, mvm = matches[6], matches[7]
local pc_name = matches[8]

regexCodeList.string: ^The Reaper appears and escorts .+ to the afterlife!$
^Your blood freezes as you hear .+ death cry\.$
^You turn your eyes away as you see .+ decapitate the corpse.$
^.+'s sword draws light from the surroundings, and darkens the world.$
^.+'s sword draws light from the surroundings, and darkens the world.$
^No way! You are fighting for your life!$
^You can't summon enough energy to cast the spell.$

Trigger.name: Muffle Other Alts
Trigger.script: local actor = matches[2] if isAlternate(matches[2]) then deleteLine() end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) stops resting, and clambers onto .+ feet\.$

Trigger.name: Strong
Trigger.script: local subdmg = matches[2] if subdmg == "crying for his mommy" then cecho( "👶🏻") elseif subdmg == "seeing little birdies" then cecho("🕊️") elseif subdmg == "starts seeing double" then cecho("👀") end

regexCodeList.string: (paints the walls|evokes a blood-curdling scream|seeing little birdies|crying for \w+ mommy|splatters chunks|starts seeing double|tissue paper|so darn hard)

Trigger.name: Epic
Trigger.script: local subdmg = matches[2] if subdmg == "brink of death" then cecho( "🪦") elseif subdmg == "paints the walls" then cecho("🖌️") elseif subdmg == "into dark oblivion" then cecho("🌀") end

regexCodeList.string: (the meaning of true suffering|rearranges .+ innards|into dark oblivion|REAL BAD|paints the walls|brink of death|Colin was here)
^((\w+) tumbles into (.+), knocking .+ across the room!)$
^((\w+) attacked (.+) suddenly and took .+ by surprise\.)$
^((\w+) takes (.+) and crushes .+ with .+ head\.\.\.Blood Everywhere!!)$
^(You are amazed at (.+) skill as (.+) scores a riposte!)$
^((.+) tries to kick (.+) in the (.+)\, but misses .*)$
^((.+) tries to grab (.+) for a headbutt, but misses .*)$
^((.+) tries to tumble into (.+), but misses horribly\.)$

Trigger.name: Incap
Trigger.script: deleteLine() incap_delay = true tempTimer( 5, [[incap_delay = false]] ) cecho( f"\n<brown>{matches[2]} appears to be in need of urgent medical attention.<reset>" )

regexCodeList.string: ^(.+) is mortally wounded, and will die soon, if not aided\.$
^(.+) is stunned, but will probably regain consciousness again\.$
^(.+) is incapacitated and will slowly die, if not aided\.$

Trigger.name: Criticals!
Trigger.script: deleteLine() cecho( f"\n<spring_green>{matches[3]} rolls a natural <deep_pink>20<reset>!" )

regexCodeList.string: ^.+ doubles over in pain as .+ root chakra begins eating .+ crown chakra!
^The act of witnessing the massive damage .+ inflicted drives .+ BERSERK!!$
^Learning by doing, .+ now hits with more precision!$
^You have learned this opponent by rote, anticipating every move before it is made against you.$
^.+ pitches a ball of magical ice at .+!$
^.+ wavers under the impact of the lightning bolt sent by .+\.$
^You gained (\d+) experience points for the kill\.$
^(\w+) tumbles into (.+), knocking .+ across the room!$
^(\w+) attacked (.+) suddenly and took .+ by surprise\.$
^(\w+) takes (.+) and crushes .+ with .+ head\.\.\.Blood Everywhere!!$
^You are amazed at (.+) skill as (.+) scores a riposte!$
^(.+) tries to kick (.+) in the (.+)\, but misses .*$
^(.+) tries to grab (.+) for a headbutt, but misses .*$
^(.+) tries to tumble into (.+), but misses horribly\.$
^(.+) screams loudly as (.+) burns .+ with blue fire!$
^(.+) pitches a ball of magical ice at (.+)!$
^(.+) screams loudly as magical ice freezes .+!$

TriggerGroup.name: Basic Reactions
TriggerGroup.script: -- Triggers for basic PC reactions to common recurring events

regexCodeList.string: ^\[1\] A small white fountain is standing at the end of the road.$
^\[\d\] A bit of Labdanum (resin) clings to the edge of a shrub.

Trigger.name: Solo Pummel
Trigger.script:
if session == 1 then
if pcStatus[4]["currentMana"] >= 150 then
expandAlias( "nan cast 'barrage of blades'", false )
elseif not pummeled then
expandAlias( "nan pummel", false ) pummeled = true pummel_timer = tempTimer( 2.8, [[pummeled = false]] )
end
end

regexCodeList.string: ^A (Yeti) stares at your flesh with a hunger\.$
^A Large (Yeti) slips through the caverns without a sound\.$

Trigger.name: autostand
Trigger.script:
-- Editing & saving in-game causes sessions to inherit the enabled state; so adding some checks to the less frequent -- patterns to re-disable it. if session ~= 1 then disableTrigger( "Group XP" ) return end
local stander = matches[2]
if ( session == 1 ) and ( stander == gtank or stander == gleader ) then expandAlias( "all stand", false ) end

Trigger.name: autorest
Trigger.script:
-- Editing & saving in-game causes sessions to inherit the enabled state; so adding some checks to the less frequent -- patterns to re-disable it. if session ~= 1 then disableTrigger( "Group XP" ) return end
if session == 1 and matches[2] == gleader then expandAlias( "all rest", false ) end
--^(\w+) stops flying and rests.$ --^(\w+) sits down and rests.$

Trigger.name: autoassist
Trigger.script:
local target_names = { ["a Threggi Worker"] = "threggi", ["a Frost Wyrm"] = "wyrm", ["Huge Purple Worm"] = "worm", }
local immune = { ["Huge Purple Worm"] = true, ["a Frost Wyrm"] = true, }
local target = matches[3] local target_name = target_names[target]
-- Editing & saving in-game causes sessions to inherit the enabled state; so adding some checks to the less frequent -- patterns to re-disable it. if session ~= 1 then disableTrigger( "Group XP" ) return end
if not assist_delay then
mu_mn = math.max( pcStatus[2]["currentMana"], pcStatus[3]["currentMana"] )
assist_delay = true tempTimer( 2.7, [[assist_delay = false]] ) expandAlias( f"all assist {gtank}", false )
if not affectStatus[1]['Fury'] and pcStatus[1]["currentMana"] >= 150 then send( "cast 'fury'" ) end
-- If MU mana is high, open with a damage spell (unless the target is a cunt) if mu_mn >= 300 and not immune[target] then cecho( "info", "\n".. f[[{target}]] ) cecho( "info", "\n".. f[[{immune[target]}]] ) tempTimer( 2.6, [[aliasMUDps()]] ) end
end

regexCodeList.string: ^.+ fell into an ambush by Nordberg.$

Trigger.name: autosplit
Trigger.script: if gleader then send( f"split {matches[2]}" ) end

Trigger.name: EoC
Trigger.script:
if pummel_timer then killTimer(pummel_timer) end expandAlias( "nan abort", false ) autoManaTransfer()
-- Editing & saving in-game causes sessions to inherit the enabled state; so adding some checks to the less frequent -- patterns to re-disable it. if session ~= 1 then disableTrigger( "Group XP" ) return end

Trigger.name: Drebin Pummel
Trigger.script:
if session == 1 then
if pcStatus[4]["currentMana"] >= 150 then
expandAlias( "nan cast 'barrage of blades'", false )
elseif not pummeled then --else expandAlias( "nan pummel", false ) pummeled = true tempTimer( 2.8, [[pummeled = false]] ) --if pummel_timer then killTimer(pummel_timer) end --pummel_timer = tempTimer( 2.8, [[expandAlias( 'nan pummel', false )]] )
end
end
--^Nordberg.*kick.*$ --Dillon tumbles into the Black Worm, knocking him across the room!

Trigger.name: Backup Automira
Trigger.script: if in_combat then backup_mira = true end

Trigger.name: autoconfig
Trigger.script: if session == 1 then local newLeader = matches[2] expandAlias( f'sleader {newLeader}', false ) if newLeader == "Drebin" then expandAlias( 'stank Nordberg', false ) elseif newLeader == "Billy" then expandAlias( 'stank Blain', false ) end expandAlias( 'amira awful', false ) end

Trigger.name: Locate Resin
Trigger.script: local roomName = matches[2] if isUnique( roomName ) then local id = uniqueRooms[roomName] creplaceLine( f "<olive_drab>resin<reset>: {getRoomString( id, 2 )}" ) end

regexCodeList.string: a small ball of Labdanum resin in (.+)\.+$

Trigger.name: Room Capture
Trigger.script: if myRoomName == matches[2] then return end myRoomName = trim( matches[2] ) triggerCaptureRoom( myRoomName ) --creplaceLine( f "{getRoomString( currentRoomNumber, 2 )}" )

Trigger.name: Cancel Walk
Trigger.script: -- Cancel a walk in progress if something goes wrong. clearQueue()

regexCodeList.string: Alas, you cannot go that way\.$
^(\w+) grabs your weapon away and throws it on the floor!$

Trigger.name: EQ Stats
Trigger.script:
local item_name = matches[2]
-- Ignore missing EQ and basic items if ignored_items[trimName( item_name )] or item_name == "-Nothing" then
selectString( matches[2], 1 ) fg( "slate_gray" ) resetFormat()
else
selectString( matches[2], 1 ) fg( "slate_grey" )
selectString( "glowing", 1 ) fg( "gold" ) selectString( "humming", 1 ) fg( "olive_drab" ) selectString( "cloned", 1 ) fg( "royal_blue" )
resetFormat()
itemQueryAppend( item_name, 1 )
end

Alias.name: Set Tank
Alias.script:
gtank = matches[2]
if gtank then -- Make sure tank is always capitalized. gtank = gtank:sub( 1, 1 ):upper() .. gtank:sub( 2 ) else gtank = "Nandor" end
cecho( "info", "\n"..f"[<slate_gray>Setting tank = <orange>{gtank}<reset>]" )

Alias.name: Set Leader
Alias.script:
gleader = matches[2]
if gleader then -- Make sure tank is always capitalized. gleader = gleader:sub( 1, 1 ):upper() .. gleader:sub( 2 ) else gleader = "Colin" end
cecho( "info", "\n"..f"[<slate_gray>Setting leader = <royal_blue>{gleader}<reset>]" )

Alias.name: Set Mira
Alias.script: local miraSet = matches[2] or "bleeding" miracleCondition = miraSet cecho( "info", f"\n[<slate_gray>Setting mira = <cyan>{miracleCondition}<reset>]" )

Alias.name: kill
Alias.script: local currentTarget = matches[2] expandAlias( f"nan assault {currentTarget}" ) expandAlias( "all assist nandor" ) tempTimer( 2.8, [[expandAlias( 'nan pummel' )]] )

Alias.name: Inventory
Alias.script: -- Before eq'ing; temporarily enable the eq database trigger family expandAlias( [[all lua tempEnableTrigger( "EQDB", 5 )]], false ) expandAlias( "all inventory", false ) expandAlias( f"col examine stocking", false ) expandAlias( f"nad examine bag", false ) expandAlias( f"nan examine bag", false ) expandAlias( f"las examine bag", false )

Alias.name: Bakery Restock (food)
Alias.script: expandAlias( "all buy 21 bread", false ) expandAlias( "all eat bread", false ) expandAlias( f"col put all.bread stocking", false ) expandAlias( f"nad put all.bread bag", false ) expandAlias( f"las put all.bread bag", false ) expandAlias( f"nan put all.bread bag", false )

Alias.name: Score (sc)
Alias.script:
if session == 1 then
for pc = 1,4 do
pcStatus[pc]["currentHP"] = 1 pcStatus[pc]["currentMana"] = 1 pcStatus[pc]["currentMoves"] = 1
end
end
-- Before scoring; temporarily enable the score-capture trigger. expandAlias( [[all lua tempEnableTrigger( "Parse Score", 5 )]], false ) expandAlias( "all score", false )

Alias.name: ID Worn
Alias.script: send( f"remove {matches[2]}" ) send( f"cast 'identify' {matches[2]}" ) send( f"wear {matches[2]}" )

Alias.name: All Rec Recall (rr)
Alias.script: expandAlias( "all recite recall", false ) expandAlias( "all get recall bag", false ) expandAlias( "all get recall stocking", false )

Alias.name: Endure (end)
Alias.script: expandAlias( 'nan get milky bag', false ) expandAlias( 'nan quaff milky', false )

Alias.name: Report Affects
Alias.script: expandAlias( 'all affect', false ) if session == 1 then printAffectStrings() end

Alias.name: Nod
Alias.script: local nogger = short_names[math.random(1,4)] expandAlias( f'{nogger} n0g', false )

Alias.name: Laugh
Alias.script: local laugher = math.random(1,4) if laugher == 1 then send( 'chuckle', false ) elseif laugher == 2 then expandAlias( 'nad chortle', false ) elseif laugher == 3 then expandAlias( 'las lol', false ) elseif laugher == 4 then expandAlias( 'nan cackle', false ) end

Alias.name: Look Full
Alias.script:
local desc = getRoomUserData( currentRoomNumber, 'roomDescription' ) local extra = getRoomUserData( currentRoomNumber, 'roomExtraKeyword' ) local flags = getRoomUserData( currentRoomNumber, 'roomFlags' ) cecho( f"

{getRoomString(currentRoomNumber,2)}" ) cecho( f"
<olive_drab>{desc}<reset>" ) cecho( f"
<dim_grey>Extra keywords:<reset> <medium_orchid>{extra}<reset>" ) cecho( f"
<dim_grey>Room flags:<reset> <gold>{flags}<reset>" )

Alias.name: Look Room
Alias.script: local desc = getRoomUserData( currentRoomNumber, 'roomDescription' ) cecho( f"\n\n<olive_drab>{desc}" )

Alias.name: Set Room Char (src)
Alias.script: local char = matches[2] if char then setRoomChar( currentRoomNumber, char ) setRoomCharColor( currentRoomNumber, 0, 0, 0 ) updateMap() end

Alias.name: Look Direction
Alias.script: local dir = matches[2] send( f'look {dir}', false ) inspectExit( currentRoomNumber, dir )

Alias.name: Roll Dice (roll)
Alias.script: send( 'get dice stocking', false ) send( 'dice', false ) send( 'put dice stocking', false )

Alias.name: Equipment (eq)
Alias.script: -- Before eq'ing; temporarily enable the eq database trigger family expandAlias( [[all lua tempEnableTrigger( "EQ Stats", 5 )]], false ) expandAlias( [[all lua tempEnableTrigger( "Missing EQ", 5 )]], false ) expandAlias( "all eq", false )

Script.name: kermudlet_init
Script.script:
-- Let Mudlet know we've got our own Map script mudlet = mudlet or {}; mudlet.mapper_script = true
homeDirectory = 'C:/dev/mud/mudlet/' luasql = require( "luasql.sqlite3" )
function runLuaFile( file ) local filePath = f '{homeDirectory}{file}' if lfs.attributes( filePath, "mode" ) == "file" then dofile( filePath ) else cecho( f "\n{filePath}<reset> not found." ) end end
tempTimer( 0, [[runLuaFile(f"kermudlet_init.lua")]] )

KeyGroup.name: Movement
KeyGroup.script: -- Binds to send movement to the command queue.

KeyGroup.name: Movement (Offline)
KeyGroup.script: -- Group for offline movement keys (i.e., simulated movement through offline map)

KeyGroup.name: Labeling
KeyGroup.script: -- Group to hold keys for adjusting labels post-placement.

KeyGroup.name: Shift Rooms
KeyGroup.script: -- Move rooms around manually when creating new ones or rearranging areas

Key.name: Shift w
Key.script: mX, mY, mZ = getRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber) mX = mX - 1 setRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber, mX, mY, mZ ) updateMap() centerview(currentRoomNumber)

Key.name: Shift e
Key.script: mX, mY, mZ = getRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber) mX = mX + 1 setRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber, mX, mY, mZ ) updateMap() centerview(currentRoomNumber)

Key.name: Shift n
Key.script: mX, mY, mZ = getRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber) mY = mY + 1 setRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber, mX, mY, mZ ) updateMap() centerview(currentRoomNumber)

Key.name: Shift s
Key.script: mX, mY, mZ = getRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber) mY = mY - 1 setRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber, mX, mY, mZ ) updateMap() centerview(currentRoomNumber)

Key.name: Shift u
Key.script: mX, mY, mZ = getRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber) mZ = mZ + 1 setRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber, mX, mY, mZ ) updateMap() centerview(currentRoomNumber)

Key.name: Shift d
Key.script: mX, mY, mZ = getRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber) mZ = mZ - 1 setRoomCoordinates(currentRoomNumber, mX, mY, mZ ) updateMap() centerview(currentRoomNumber)
